mapper.insert: insert into board( board_number, writer, subject, email, content, password, write_date, read_count, group_number, sequence_number, sequence_level, file_name, path, file_size) values( board_board_number_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{email}, #{content}, #{password}, #{writeDate}, #{readCnt}, #{groupNumber}, #{sequenceNumber}, #{sequenceLevel}, #{fileName}, #{path}, #{fileSize})

insert into board( board_number, writer, subject, email, content, password, write_date, read_count, group_number, sequence_number, sequence_level) values( board_board_number_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{email}, #{content}, #{password}, #{writeDate}, #{readCnt}, #{groupNumber}, #{sequenceNumber}, #{sequenceLevel})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from board order by group_number desc, sequence_number asc) a) b where b.rnum>=#{startRow} and b.rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set read_count=read_count+1 where board_number=#{boardNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from board where board_number=to_number(#{boardNumber}) and password=#{password}
